remarks: In an ordered group, the ordering is compatible with group subtraction (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)
statement:
ogrpsub.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ogrpsub.1 $e |- .<_ = ( le ` G ) $.
ogrpsub.2 $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
ogrpsub $p |- ( ( G e. oGrp /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X .<_ Y ) -> ( X .- Z ) .<_ ( Y .- Z ) ) $.
